Privacy Policy for Covoiturage TN

Effective date: [Insert Date]

Introduction

Welcome to Covoiturage TN. Your privacy is very important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data.

Information We Collect

  • Location Data: We use OpenStreetMap for real-time ride matching and location sharing between users.
  • Microphone and Camera: Only accessed during video or audio calls within the app. No audio/video data is stored.
  • Google Sign-In: We collect your name, email, and profile picture URL. We never access or store your Google password.
  • Phone Number: Used solely for communication between users within the app.
  • User Ratings and Comments: To ensure reliability and safety within the community.

How We Use Your Data

Your data is used strictly to facilitate ride-sharing, communication, and enhance user experience within the app.

Data Security and Storage

All personal data is securely stored using Firebase (Google Cloud Platform). We implement robust security measures to protect your data.

Data Sharing and Disclosure

We never sell, rent, or disclose your data to third parties unless required by law.

Payments

No financial transactions are processed in our app. All payments are cash transactions directly between users.

Your Rights

You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. Contact us at the email provided below for assistance.

Changes to This Policy

We may occasionally update this Privacy Policy. Updates will be clearly posted here.
